downloadTitle: Beyond Infrastructure: Cloud 2.0 Signifies New Opportunities for Cloud Service Providers
downloadDescription: Learn about the latest trends and decision making process of companies transitioning to the cloud with service providers.

detailsSection: The, “Beyond Infrastructure: Cloud 2.0 Signifies New Opportunities for Cloud Service Providers”, is a research report in which the 451 Group surveyed close to 2,000 IT decision makers across small, midsize, and large organizations in 11 different countries about their cloud and hosting needs and specifications.  The, “Beyond Infrastructure: Cloud 2.0 Signifies New Opportunities for Cloud Service Providers”, is a research report in which the 451 Group surveyed close to 2,000 IT decision makers across small, midsize and large organizations in 11 different countries about their cloud and hosting needs and specifications.  Learn about the latest trends and decision making process of companies transitioning to the cloud with service providers.
detailsSection_file_name: MSFT Hosting End-User Full Slide Set 3.17.15 Complete.pdf
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
